title: Study on the Effectiveness of Online Lecture Formats: Optimal Video Lecture Design for Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: A language learning course using non-real-time LMS in digital device-provided environments. Requires monitoring learners' comprehension and concentration through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can select the most suitable lecture format (audio, audio+text, audio+instructor video) for their learning concentration from diverse online formats.
Learners can experimentally analyze comprehension differences based on lecture formats and establish optimal learning strategies.
Learners can explain the correlation between lecture format preferences and actual learning outcomes based on formative assessment results.

resources: Sample lecture materials in various formats

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
